title: *No Fee* 1 bed 1 bath rent stabilized apartment in Boerum hill
posting_body: ['Generously sized 1BR, 22A features', '- Stunning, north facing large windows', '- Large living space', '- Full size appliances', '- Laundry in building', '- Fitness center', '- Courtyard', '- 24-hr doorman', '- Elevator', 'Looking for someone to take over the remainder of our rent-stabilized lease with the option to renew.', 'The unit is available September 7 (may be flexible) and the lease ends mid-May.', 'All applicants need to apply through the building and sign a sublease directly with them.', 'The Addison is emblematic of what Brooklyn is about.', 'Where Boerum Hill and Downtown meet, the Addison offers the best of both worlds featuring modern amenities while contextually woven into the fabric of its surroundings.', 'With an array of restaurants, high-end retailers, antique shops and transportation all within easy reach.']
